pkgmetadata.longdescription: Redir listens for TCP connections on a given port, and, when it recieves a connection, then connects to a given destination address:port, and pass data between them. It finds most of its applications in traversing firewalls, but, of course, there are other uses.

use.flag: Add support for the xinetd super-server
Support for FTP (File Transfer Protocol) redirection
